response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its market value and the effort put into it, I am offering you the chance to own it for $200. This price reflects the superior quality and the value it brings to its owner. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 200}
